Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Those "Bafoons" used the Utahraptor, it was discovered shortly before the m=
ovie was in real production. They just called them Veloci's to make them sc=
arier.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, February 07, 2001 6:18 PM
  Subject: =
OOC to Cyberwolf...


  Actually, Velociraptor's are 3 feet tall. Including=
 tail they are 10 feet long, but I think they would easily fit into a cab. =
Ignore Jurassic Park, those bufoons made giant sized raptors, and they were=
 really just 3 feet tall...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYB=
ERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, February 07, =
2001 9:53 AM
    Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


    Razor Claw get=
s scrunched into Optimus Primes cab section. Fealing somewhat claustrophobi=
c he puts his foot through the windshield trying to escape. 

    (I don't =
know if you've ever been inside the cab of a truck but theres not much room=
 for an average height human let alone a raptor so the damage is logical.)
=

    "I am not fooled easily." Razor Claw calls out furiously, "I have been=
 educated on the legacy of Prime and you cannot be him."
      ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
      From: dachande 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
 =
     Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 12:58 PM
      Subject: Re: Dachande r=
espond or else


      ::Optimus Prime::

          He grabbed the tail and=
 picked up the raptor. "You will listen to me. Do you even know who I am? I=
 am Optimus Prime, the leader of the Autobots, the holder of the Matrix of =
Leadership."
          He transformed to truck mode, Razor Claw falling ins=
ide the cab section. "Follow me."
          He took off once again towards =
the CF.

      (He was holding him during transformation.)
        ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com 
        Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 6:07 PM
        Subject: R=
e: Dachande respond or else


        Razor Claw released his sword glaring=
 at Optimus Prime and Eclipse. He transformed to Raptor to even the odds if=
 necessary. "You ran from a battle while other Maximals risked both spark a=
nd limb to protect it." The angry Raptor wan't in his right mind, he was su=
ffering an imbalance brought on by Veratis' virus. His thoughts were one si=
ded and could only see his form of reason. 

        He was the mighty rapt=
or and these four were no more than lowly prey to be consumed. it didn't ma=
tter if he believed thier story. The desertion was merely an excuse to lash=
 out and look tough. Lash out he did swinging his powerful tail at Optimus,=
 slashin a claw from his left foot at Eclipse and snapping his jaws at Wolv=
eritron.
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: dachande 
=
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Monday, February 05, =
2001 8:19 AM
          Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


          ::=
Optimus Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

              Optimus Prime reac=
hed out and grabbed the sword, just holding it there.
              "There =
will be no bloodshed today," Prime said. "Whatever these bots did, I'm sure=
 they have their reasons. Please allow them to explain."
              Ecli=
pse looked at the bot and shifted to his most powerful form, the Werewolf. =
"We left the Cybertronian Fire because our work will not benifit if I am de=
stroyed. The Alliance was coming dangeroudly close to destroying the CF. I =
had to get out. I am now returning to the CF, with Optimus Prime, here."
  =
          ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: CYBERWOLF4 
     =
       To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Monday, February 05, 2=
001 11:51 AM
            Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


          =
  Razor Claw stood unmoving, staring Wolveritron down.

            "You do=
n't fight back?" he glared at the deserter HOPING FOR A RESPONSE.

        =
    "You do not fight then you admit your guilt." he drew his sword and swu=
ng it in a backslashing motion at a level to decapitate Wolveritron.


    =
          ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: CYBERWOLF4 
   =
           To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, Februa=
ry 01, 2001 9:31 PM
              Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


 =
             Razor Claw stands up straight, looking toward Prime. "Stay out=
 of this, you are not part of the accused or a viable witness so you have n=
o say in what happens to these deserters."

              The mutant wasn't=
 exactly what bots would consider sane. he was injected with a virus to sta=
bilize his double transformation but was only given one sequence to key upo=
n. Maybe it was the virus, maybe it was his injuries, or maybe the former P=
red was just sickened by bots who'd run from a battle and leave thier comra=
des to suffer the pains of battle.

              "Now for business I was d=
ealing with you!" he reached out and poked Wolveritron in the chestplate tr=
ying to pursue his issues.


                ----- Original Message ----- 
=
                From: dachande 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

                Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 1:57 PM
                =
Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


                ::Optimus Prime/Ecl=
ipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

                    They had not heard Razor Claw=
 ask them to stop, but they heard him the second time. Prime was walking aw=
ay, but he stopped and came back.
                    "Is there something y=
ou need from us?" Prime asked.
                  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
                  From: CYBERWOLF4 
                  To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com 
                  Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 10:22 AM
   =
               Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


                  It=
 all started back when...


                     ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
                    From: dachande 
                    To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
                    Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
      =
              Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


                  =
  ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

                        They had heard the=
 battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the conflict. Ecl=
ipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther they =
exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away

                    S=
o I responded with...
                    . 
                    Razor Claw=
 saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook them for es=
caping alliance members. he mentally reported his actions to Ice and got th=
e go ahead. He chased the three until they were out of the way of the fight=
. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "You =
will stop or you will be forced to, your choice."

                    Then=
 a few more posts of Razor Claw tracking them until finally Optimus Prime (=
Razor Claw doesn't know enough about Prime to recognise him) Wolveritron, R=
amus, and Eclipse were finally together. and Razor Claw caught up with them=
.(I can't find the cave posting I thought it was those three that were in t=
he same cave as Vuloise.)

                    He aproached the three bots =
ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully









=






          Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
             
                      =
www.
